Sentencas: An anomalous oxide scale formed on Fe-Cr alloy interconnects was investigated under operation conditions for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Anomalous oxidation of ferritic interconnects in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A dilute CH4-H2O was flowed one side and air was flowed the other side under constant current flow (0.3A cm(-2)).
Titulo: Anomalous oxidation of ferritic interconnects in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The Pt-mesh/alloy interface resistance in CH4-H2O increases with reaction time in a parabolic relationship.
Titulo: Anomalous oxidation of ferritic interconnects in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The diffusion controlled mechanism was proposed for the Pt-mesh/alloy interfaces with normal oxide scale.
Titulo: Anomalous oxidation of ferritic interconnects in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: An anomalous thick oxide scale was found near the outer of glass/alloy interfaces, which was exposed to air.
Titulo: Anomalous oxidation of ferritic interconnects in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The thick oxide scale was composed of Fe-oxide in the outer layer and Cr-oxide in the inner layer (above +/- 50 mu m thick from the original level) with SiO2 and Al2O3 inner oxides.
Titulo: Anomalous oxidation of ferritic interconnects in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The microstructures and elemental distribution of the anomalous thick oxides were investigated.
Titulo: Anomalous oxidation of ferritic interconnects in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A possible formation mechanism of the anomalous oxide scale was discussed by considering the reaction with glass components.
Titulo: Anomalous oxidation of ferritic interconnects in solid oxide fuel cells
